Taiwan Production Takes A Hit From China Lockdowns https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/taiwan-production-takes-a-hit-from-china-lockdowns/ $AAPL

links.title: Taiwan Production Takes A Hit From China Lockdowns
links.description: As the COVID-19 lockdown continues in China's financial center Shanghai, more and more companies have been forced to halt production. What Happened: At least 11 Taiwanese companies, mostly making parts for electronics firms, said the lockdown in China had led them to suspend production, according to a Reuters report.

body: Apple’s Mixed-Reality Headset May Not Launch This Year https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/apples-mixed-reality-headset-may-not-launch-this-year/  $AAPL

links.title: Apple's Mixed-Reality Headset May Not Launch This Year
links.description: Apple, Inc.'s APPL much-awaited mixed reality headset, having AR/VR capabilities, has long been in the works. With Cupertino tightlipped about the product and the launch timeline, the Street is awash with speculation concerning the headset. What Happened: Apple's MR headset will be launched in the first quarter of 2023, 9to5Mac reported, citing a report by Haitong International Securities analyst Jeff Pu.

links.title: Project Veritas says US seized staffer info as part of probe
links.description: WASHINGTON (AP) - The conservative activist group Project Veritas said Wednesday that the Justice Department had secretly obtained from Apple and Google personal information about its staffers as part of an investigation into how the organization received a diary purported to belong to President Joe Biden's daughter.
